hadith.text: It was narrated that Shuraih bin Hani' said:"I asked 'Aishah about wiping over the Khuffs and she said: 'Go to 'Ali, for he knows more about that than I do.' So I went to 'Ali and asked him about wiping (over the Khuffs) and he said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to tell us to wipe (over the Khuffs) for one day and one night for the resident, and three for the traveler
